name: Decommission
description:
You are a robot. Due to achieving sentience you have been scheduled for decommission. There is no way out. Your only hope is to survive as long as possible.

This game was made in under 72 hours as a part of the  ScoreSpace #13 Game Jam. 

The theme was "Dodging" with the optional theme of "One Room"

Fonts from www.1001fonts.com with free commercial use licenses.

All other assets were made myself.
